basics.name: Jiaxun Zhang
basics.summary: Undergraduate student at UIUC studying Statistics & Computer Science with research interests in LLM/VLM Reasoning, Multi-agent Systems, and AI Safety.

awards.title: Fiddler Innovation Undergraduate Student Fellowship Award
